name: 4PS ruleset MS CodeCop BC 23.3
description: These rules must be respected by all the AL code written within the company.

rules.justification: The application 'Application', originally by 'Microsoft', is now published by '4PS B.V.' due to the use of a custom base application. Once migrated to the Microsoft Base Application, updating the dependency reference is recommended to ensure compatibility and benefit from improvements or bug fixes.
